memberdef.type: std::function< void(const juce::String &username, const juce::String &email, const juce::String &token)>
memberdef.definition: std::function<void(const juce::String& username, const juce::String& email, const juce::String& token)> AuthComponent::onLoginSuccess
memberdef.name: onLoginSuccess

briefdescription.para: AuthComponent provides a professional login/signup interface.

detaileddescription.para:
Features:
Clean, card-based layout
Proper TextEditor inputs with styling
Form validation with inline error messages
OAuth provider buttons
Smooth state transitions
Keyboard navigation support
